alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Furnas; Harlan; Nuckolls; Thayer; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 15 at 8:25PM CST until December 15 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...BLOWING DUST WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Sustained west-northwest winds as high as 30 to 40 MPH and gusts as high as 50 to 60 MPH. * WHERE...Harlan, Furnas, Thayer, Nuckolls, Webster and Franklin Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be dangerous. Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will slowly diminish through the remainder of the night.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Franklin; Furnas; Harlan; Nuckolls; Thayer; Webster
